ingredients: 4 (1 ounce total) dried guajillo chiles, stemmed and torn into several pieces each
1/215-ounce can diced tomatoes in juice (preferably fire-roasted), drained
1/4 teaspoon each ground cumin, all-spice and cinnamon, preferably Mexican canela
4(1 pound total) boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch cubes
6ounces green beans, tops and tails broken off and cut into 2-inch pieces (you need about 2 cups)

2large (1 pound total) chayotes, peeled (if you wish), pitted and cut into 1-inch cubes OR 4 medium (1 pound total) red-skin boiling or Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled (if you wish) and cut into 1-inch cubes

2large (1 pound total) chayotes, peeled (if you wish), pitted and cut into 1-inch cubes OR 4 medium (1 pound total) red-skin boiling or Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled (if you wish) and cut into 1-inch cubes
1 to 2freshhoja santa leaves , torn into 1-inch pieces OR 1/2 cup (or more) roughly chopped cilantro
